tool_description: This API will do online-validation and discovery of email addresses. You can either test if an existing address is correct or give a first and last name to test common patterns.
name: Online Email Validation and Discovery
title: Online Email Validation and Discovery

api_list.name: Online validate email
Discover emails by domain
api_list.description: Find emails belonging to a domain. Useful to guess the address pattern used in a company.

api_list.name: Guess email from name and domain
api_list.description: Enter a first name, last name and domain. We will check common email patterns and test if they are correct.
